text:
@realDonaldTrump The Wisconsin Supreme Court ordered the state to open while they conducted their arguments remotely. Just like you say COVID19 is no big deal while requiring anyone in your orbit to be tested daily. 

You’re all epic hypocrites. https://t.co/OQMmxadtXL
